amendment.description: To permit direct payment under the Medicare program for clinical social worker services provided to residents of skilled nursing facilities.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 1090 withdrawn in Senate.

Amendment SA 1090 proposed by Senator Baucus for Senator Mikulski. (consideration: CR S8538-8539; text: CR S8539) To permit direct payment under the Medicare program for clinical social worker services provided to residents of skilled nursing facilities.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1090 proposed by Senator Baucus for Senator Mikulski.
